name: Academagia: The Making of Mages
description: Academagia, the greatest of the ancient schools for wizards. Build the legend of your mage with thousands of options, emergent storytelling and endless replayability. The definitive version of the magical life simulator is at last on Steam!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 (x64 OS) Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with 1 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: .NET 4.0 Framework, Display resolution 800 x 600
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Additional Notes: Display resolution 1920 x 1080 or higher
